sentences.sContent: Place Louis in front and Brumaire behind, you have the whole destiny of the man, with this significant peculiarity, that the end treads close on the heels of the commencement.
sentences.sContent_eng: Place Louis in front and Brumaire behind, you have the whole destiny of the man, with this significant peculiarity, that the end treads close on the heels of the commencement.
sentences.sCn: 你把路易放在它的前面，雾月放在它的后面，①这人的整个命运便全显现在你面前了。 这里又还有这么一个耐人寻味的特点，那就是开场是被结局紧跟着的。
